Run the Nyx DeFi heartbeat check. Use the near-intents skill to execute: /opt/near-intents-helper/run_near_intents.sh heartbeat --risk medium

If any actions were taken or errors occurred, send me a brief summary on WhatsApp. If everything is stable and no actions were needed, stay silent (don't message me).

Generate and send the daily Nyx DeFi report. Use the near-intents skill to execute: /opt/near-intents-helper/run_near_intents.sh daily-report

Format the results into a clear, concise message with:
- Portfolio value and daily P&L
- Any active positions (staking, lending)
- Top yield opportunities
- Trading status (active or halted)
- Any alerts or warnings

Keep it brief and readable on a phone screen.
